name: zoopark-monorepo
description: Zoo Park Website - Full Stack Application

scripts.dev: npx concurrently "npm run dev --workspace=frontend" "npm run dev --workspace=backend"
scripts.build:vercel: cd frontend && npm install && npx vite build
scripts.test: npm run test --workspace=frontend && npm run test --workspace=backend
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install --workspace=frontend && npm run install --workspace=backend
